titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Anna Rebni, 18. 7. 1946
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift (Norweger Briefe, S. 157). Publiziert (Norweger Briefe, S. 157).

div.p: I am sending this letter by a friend, Mr Ben Richards who is going to Norway on a climbing tour. Please be nice & kind to him, & think you're doing it for me. I still think of you quite often & I hope you don't find life too difficult. I was extremely sorry to hear of Arne Drægni's death. He was the best friend I had in Skjolden. I hope I shall be able to come to Norway next year & I hope to see you then.
